bpp/descriptor.name: Sabhyasha Retail Tech Private Limited
bpp/descriptor.short_desc: One Stop Shop For Indian Handicraft Handloom
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Sabhyasha is a tech driven organisation working with an objective to empower the Handicraft Artisans and Handloom weavers / Producer Groups to be part of an exclusive democratic marketplace to showcase and sale products directly to consumers with best in class service. Which will help them improvise and scale up their business.

address.street: G 506, Utkal Vatika Near Shiva Mandir

descriptor.name: Boita Bandana Pattachitra Bomkai Patta Saree
descriptor.short_desc: Embrace traditional Odisha craftsmanship with our exquisite Boita Bandana Pattachitra Bomkai Patta Saree. Handcrafted with love, this saree showcases intricate Pattachitra artwork and unique Bomkai patterns, making it a stunning addition to your ethnic wardrobe.
descriptor.long_desc: The Boita Bandana Pattachitra Bomkai Patta Saree category is an exquisite collection of sarees that beautifully blend the timeless traditions of Boita Bandana, Pattachitra, and Bomkai art forms. These sarees, named after the regions they originate from, are crafted with immense precision and attention to detail, making them a perfect choice for any special occasion. The Boita Bandana design within these sarees draws inspiration from the age-old maritime tradition of Odisha. It reflects the essence of ancient sea-faring expeditions where intricately woven motifs of boats and fish symbolize good luck and prosperity. These sarees exhibit a unique fusion of vibrant hues and delicate patterns, reflecting the rich cultural heritage of the region. Pattachitra, on the other hand, is a traditional art form that originated in the state of Odisha. It involves intricate painting on cloth, depicting various mythological stories and folklore using vivid colors and fine brushwork. The Pattachitra elements incorporated into these sarees add a whimsical touch, truly creating wearable works of art. Bomkai is a traditional weaving technique that originated in the town of Sonepur in Odisha. The defining feature of a Bomkai saree is its intricately woven borders and Pallu (decorative end piece) that showcase traditional motifs such as animals, flowers, and peacocks. The combination of Bomkai weaving with the Boita Bandana and Pattachitra motifs creates a visually stunning amalgamation of textures and designs. The 'Boita Bandana Pattachitra Bomkai Patta Saree' collection offers a wide range of color options to suit every taste and preference, ranging from deep maroons, vibrant oranges, royal blues, enchanting greens, and regal purples. The soft and flowy fabric used in these sarees ensures a comfortable draping experience, enabling you to look and feel confident all day long. Whether you have a wedding, festive celebration, or any other special event on the horizon, these sarees will undoubtedly make you stand out from the crowd. Each piece is meticulously handcrafted by skilled artisans, ensuring the highest levels of quality and attention to detail. With intricate boota designs, dazzling zari work, and exquisite borders, these sarees radiate an aura of timeless elegance. By choosing a saree from the 'Boita Bandana Pattachitra Bomkai Patta Saree collection, you are not only owning a beautiful piece of clothing but also supporting the rich heritage and craftsmanship of Odisha. So, indulge yourself in the charm and grace of these sarees and let the world witness your impeccable sense of style and affinity towards Indian culture.

descriptor.name: Silver Toned Lotus Hanging Earrings
descriptor.short_desc: Elevate your look with the versatile charm of our Silver-Toned Lotus Hanging Earrings. The lotus design exudes grace and elegance, making these earrings suitable for various occasions. Whether you are attending a special event or adding a touch of sophistication to your everyday style, these earrings effortlessly enhance your ensemble.
descriptor.long_desc: These Silver-Toned Lotus Hanging Earrings are symbolic of the beauty of the Lotus. These exquisite earrings feature a lotus design that holds deep cultural and spiritual significance. The silver-toned finish adds a touch of elegance, enhancing the allure of these hanging earrings. With their captivating lotus motif and graceful movement, these earrings become a statement accessory that effortlessly elevates your style.

descriptor.name: Silver Oxidized Half Moon Fish Hook Earrings
descriptor.short_desc: Our Silver Oxidized Half Moon Fish Hook Earrings are here to accompany you on your journey, capturing the essence of those unforgettable moments. Discover a timeless treasure that transcends trends and becomes a cherished part of your jewelry collection.
descriptor.long_desc: Step into the spotlight and let your style shine with our stunning Silver Oxidized Half Moon Fish Hook Earrings. Crafted with utmost care and attention to detail, these exquisite earrings are designed to enhance your natural beauty and make a bold fashion statement. As you sway and move, the earrings dance with you, catching the light and reflecting it in a mesmerizing display. The intricate oxidized pattern on the surface creates depth and dimension, adding a touch of mystique to your ensemble. With their lightweight construction, you can wear them comfortably from day to night, ensuring that you always exude elegance and charm.

descriptor.name: Oxidized Silver Plated Kundan Chandbali Earrings For Girls & Women
descriptor.short_desc: Indulge in the luxury of these Chandbali earrings, where every detail is crafted with precision and care. The oxidized silver plating adds a touch of vintage allure, while the Kundan stones exude a regal and luxurious feel. As you adorn yourself with these stunning earrings, you will feel like royalty, exuding confidence and sophistication.
descriptor.long_desc: These oxidized silver-plated Kundan Chandbali earrings are the epitome of elegance. These exquisite earrings showcase a perfect fusion of traditional charm and contemporary flair. The intricate detailing of Kundan stones, set against the backdrop of oxidized silver plating, creates a mesmerizing visual feast that instantly elevates your style. Whether you're attending a wedding, a festive celebration, or a special evening event, these Chandbali earrings are sure to make a statement and leave a lasting impression.

descriptor.name: Silver Oxidised Ghungroo Jhumka Earrings For Girls & Women
descriptor.short_desc: These Silver Oxidized Ghungroo Jhumka Earrings are a celebration of rich cultural heritage. Jhumkas have been a cherished part of Indian jewelry for centuries, symbolizing femininity and grace. The addition of ghungroos brings a playful twist to the traditional design, infusing it with joy and liveliness.
descriptor.long_desc: Step into a world of mesmerizing beauty with our Silver Oxidized Ghungroo Jhumka Earrings. These enchanting earrings combine the timeless elegance of jhumkas with the playful charm of ghungroos. Adorned with tiny silver bells that create a melodious tinkling sound with every movement, these earrings add a touch of magic to your ensemble. Let the captivating melody of the ghungroos accompany you as you dance through life, expressing your individuality with grace and style.

descriptor.name: Silver Look Alike Peacock Designed Hoop Earrings For Girls & Women
descriptor.short_desc: Wear a work of art with our Silver Look Alike Peacock Designed Hoop Earrings. The intricate detailing and precise craftsmanship of the peacock design make these earrings a true masterpiece. From the delicately etched feathers to the graceful curves of the hoop, every element showcases the artistry and creativity of the designer.
descriptor.long_desc: Indulge in the radiance of these Silver Look Alike Peacock Designed Hoop Earrings. Made with the finest materials and craftsmanship, these earrings feature a stunning silver-like finish that mimics the luster of precious silver jewelry. The metallic shine enhances the beauty of the peacock design, reflecting light and drawing attention to your ears. Adorn yourself with these earrings, and watch as they become the centerpiece of your ensemble, adding a touch of glamour and sophistication.

descriptor.name: Oxidized Silver Plated Ghungroo Jhumka Earrings For Girls & Women
descriptor.short_desc: Make every moment unforgettable with our Oxidized Silver Plated Ghungroo Jhumka Earrings. Whether you are attending a wedding, a cultural celebration, or a special event, these earrings add a touch of sophistication and elegance to your outfit.
descriptor.long_desc: Our Oxidized Silver Plated Ghungroo Jhumka Earrings are a symphony of elegance, where each element complements the other in perfect harmony. The jhumka's cascading design exudes grace and poise, while the ghungroos add a touch of playfulness. The combination of these elements creates a captivating accessory that enhances your style, making you the center of attention wherever you go.

descriptor.name: Silver Oxidized Embossed Lord Ganesha Earrings For Women & Girls
descriptor.short_desc: Each pair of our Silver Oxidized Embossed Lord Ganesha Earrings is crafted with deep reverence for the spiritual significance they hold. Our skilled artisans meticulously create the embossed design, capturing the essence of Lord Ganesha is wisdom and blessings.
descriptor.long_desc: Elevate your style with the sacred aura of our Silver Oxidized Embossed Lord Ganesha Earrings. These earrings pay homage to the revered deity, Lord Ganesha, with their intricate embossed design. The oxidized silver finish adds a touch of mystique, creating a sense of connection to the divine. As you wear these earrings, feel the blessings of Lord Ganesha accompany you, adding an aura of spirituality to your ensemble.

descriptor.name: Nrityakala Pattachitra Hand-painted Chanderi Silk Dupatta
descriptor.short_desc: Elevate your style with the Nrityakala Pattachitra Hand-painted Chanderi Silk Dupatta. This exquisite accessory adds a touch of elegance and cultural richness to any ensemble. The soft and luxurious Chanderi silk fabric drapes gracefully, while the hand-painted Nrityakala motifs exude a sense of artistic charm and sophistication.
descriptor.long_desc: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of Nrityakala with our Hand-painted Nrityakala Pattachitra Chanderi Silk Dupatta. This exquisite piece of art celebrates the grace and beauty of Indian classical dance forms. Every brushstroke on this hand-painted dupatta brings to life the intricate movements, expressions, and costumes that define the essence of Nrityakala. The Nrityakala Pattachitra design adorns the finest Chanderi silk fabric, blending traditional art with contemporary style. The hand-painted motifs capture the vibrant colors and fluidity of dance, creating a visual symphony that reflects the artistry of Indian culture. Step into the realm of Nrityakala and let this hand-painted dupatta become your partner in artistic expression.
